name: fuzzyhome

scripts.build: npm run build-app && npm run build-sw
scripts.static: npm run build && cd dist && python3 -m http.server
scripts.preview: npm version patch && npm run build && npm run publish-preview

description: A lightweight new-tab page that lets you very quickly fuzzy find links and navigate to a result.
author: Mikey Oz (https://github.com/familyfriendlymikey)
